recipes.title: Vegan Pancakes
recipe: Mash the banana in a bowl.
Add flour and almond milk, mixing until smooth.
Heat a pan and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side.
Serve warm with your favorite toppings.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipe: Grill the chicken until fully cooked, then slice it.
Chop lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumber.
Mix everything in a bowl and toss with your preferred dressing.
Serve fresh and enjoy.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipe: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and mix with lemon juice.
Spread the avocado mixture on the toast.
Serve immediately with optional toppings like chili flakes or cherry tomatoes.

recipes.title: Beef Stir Fry
recipe: Heat a pan and cook beef strips until browned.
Add soy sauce and sliced bell peppers.
Stir-fry for a few minutes until vegetables are tender.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Berry Smoothie
recipe: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass and enjoy immediately.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe: Heat a pan with a little oil.
Add chopped broccoli and carrots.
Stir-fry with soy sauce until tender-crisp.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Egg and Avocado Bowl
recipe: Boil or scramble eggs.
Slice avocado and arrange with eggs and spinach in a bowl.
Season as desired and enjoy.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipe: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook minced beef until browned.
Add tomato sauce and simmer.
Serve over spaghetti with optional cheese topping.

recipes.title: Chickpea Curry
recipe: Sauté spices in a pan.
Add chickpeas and coconut milk.
Simmer until thickened and serve with rice.

recipes.title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
recipe: Layer Greek yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass.
Repeat layers until full.
Serve immediately or chill for later.

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
recipe: Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Let it cool
Then mix with chopped cherry tomatoes
cucumber, and crumbled feta cheese.
Drizzle with lemon juice.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipe: Simmer tomato sauce and bell peppers.
Crack the eggs into the sauce and cook until the eggs are done.
Serve with bread.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
recipe: Season salmon with olive oil and lemon.
Grill for a few minutes on each side.
Serve with vegetables or rice.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipe: Slice mozzarella and tomatoes.
Layer with basil leaves.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and serve.

recipes.title: Lentil Soup
recipe: Sauté onions and carrots.
Add lentils, spices, and water.
Simmer until lentils are tender and serve.

recipes.title: Protein Smoothie
recipe: Blend protein powder, banana, almond milk, and peanut butter until smooth.

recipes.title: Tuna Salad
recipe: Mix canned tuna with mayonnaise and chopped celery.
Serve on lettuce leaves.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipe: Stuff bell peppers with cooked quinoa and black beans.
Bake until tender.

recipes.title: Miso Soup
recipe: Dissolve miso paste in hot water.
Add tofu, seaweed, and green onions.

recipes.title: Chicken Burrito Bowl
recipe: Cook chicken and rice.
Layer in a bowl with black beans and salsa.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipe: Top pizza dough with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil.
Bake until crispy.

recipes.title: Zucchini Noodles
procedure: Toss with pesto sauce and cherry tomatoes.

recipes.title: Sweet Potato Fries
recipe: Slice sweet potatoes.
Toss in olive oil and spices, and bake until crispy.

recipes.title: Eggplant Parmesan
recipe: Bread and fry eggplant slices.
Layer with tomato sauce and parmesan, then bake.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipe: Toss grilled chicken with romaine lettuce and Caesar dressing.

recipes.title: Banana Oatmeal
recipe: Cook oats in almond milk.
Top with sliced banana and honey.

recipes.title: Falafel Wrap
recipe: Wrap falafel, hummus, and lettuce in a tortilla.
Serve.

recipes.title: Grilled Shrimp Skewers
recipe: Skewer shrimp with lemon and garlic.
Grill until cooked.

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Cookies
recipe: Mix peanut butter, flour, and sugar.
Bake until golden.

recipes.title: Coconut Rice
recipe: Cook rice in coconut milk.
Top with coconut flakes.
